verses.text: The \sc Lord\sc* reigneth; let the people tremble: He sitteth \add between\add* the cherubims; let the earth be moved.
The \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* great in Zion; And he \add is\add* high above all the people.
Let them praise thy great and terrible name; \add For\add* it \add is\add* holy.
The kingâ€™s strength also loveth judgment; Thou dost establish equity, Thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob.
Exalt ye the \sc Lord\sc* our God, And worship at his footstool; \add For\add* he \add is\add* holy.
Moses and Aaron among his priests, And Samuel among them that call upon his name; They called upon the \sc Lord\sc*, and he answered them.
He spake unto them in the cloudy pillar: They kept his testimonies, and the ordinance \add that\add* he gave them.
Thou answeredst them, O \sc Lord\sc* our God: Thou wast a God that forgavest them, Though thou tookest vengeance of their inventions.
Exalt the \sc Lord\sc* our God, And worship at his holy hill; For the \sc Lord\sc* our God \add is\add* holy.
